author: Staff Reporter
text:
Coimbatore-based Kirtilals has received the Diamond Jeweller-South Award at GJTCI Excellence Awards 2015 held in Ahmedabad recently. According to a press release from the company, the award recognises the brand’s contribution to the gem and jewellery industry.

Camp held

Suzlon Foundation in association with Imayam, an NGO, Sankara Eye Hospital and RVS Dental College and Hospital, organised eye and dental screening camp at Kittampalayam here.
title: Diamond Jeweller- South Award presented
